dragDropFile: Drag & drop a file here, or click to browse
duplicateWarning: {{count}} student(s) already exist and will be overridden:
errorBoundaryMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please reload the page to continue.
emptyGridSubtitle: Import a file or add rows manually
emptyResultsSubtitle: Go back and assign students to see results here
landingTagline: Optimally assign students to balanced classes
featureSmartDesc: Algorithm-based balanced class assignment considering multiple constraints
featureDragDesc: Reassign students between classes interactively with drag and drop
featureExportDesc: Download your class assignments as an Excel file
howToStep1: Import a file or manually enter student data into the grid
howToStep2: Set the number of classes and run the assignment algorithm
howToStep3: Review the results and drag students between classes to reassign
howToStep4: Export the final assignment as a spreadsheet
aboutDescription: Classroom Assignment is a tool for optimally distributing students into balanced classes. It takes into account gender balance, friend preferences, separation constraints, and academic and behavioral scores to produce fair and effective class assignments.
